sentences: In 2008, they released a version of the Kid Rock song All Summer Long to the iTunes Store in North America.

In 2008, they released a version of the Kid Rock song All Summer Long to the iTunes Store in North America. Due to Kid Rock's decision to withhold his music from the iTunes market, sales from the karaoke version eventually caused it to overtake Kid Rock's original on the Billboard Hot 100 in the United States peaking at number 19.
However, the radio success of "All Summer Long" propelled Rock N Roll Jesus back up to number two on the Billboard 200, nearly a year after its release.
In 2012, a pre-release cover version of Carly Rae Jepsen's Call Me Maybe charted at #72 on the UK Singles Chart.
